segments.text: Whoa , whoa , what ’ s going on ? Watch out !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , watch where you ’ re going !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no ! I ’ m so sorry ! Are you all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel terrible , I really didn ’ t mean to knock you over . My tire , just exploded , and I lost control of my bike . Really , it was an accident . Please accept my apologies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , wait a second , you seem really familiar , I think I know you from somewhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I think we have met somewhere before . That ’ s right ! We met at Aaron ’ s place last weekend ! What a coincidence ! But anyway , I ’ m glad to see that you ’ re not too badly hurt , and I should probably get going . I have a nine o ’ clock meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ouch ! My ankle ! I think it ’ s broken ! You can ’ t just leave me like this ! Are you calling an ambulance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nope , I ’ m canceling my appointment so that I can stay here with you .
segments.speaker: S1
